title: **Group Dispanded**
body:
So the client has been acting a bit weird.

Cant seem to duo up with my mate in ranked. When ever he accepts an invitation, he gets a message to try and restart the group or restart the client.

Tried these things.  Still seems to happen.

when we finally manage to get in a que, after about a minute, we get a group disbanded message and are back to square one.{{summoner:12}} 
(yaaaaay).

we never seem to have these issue, but all of a sudden it happened today. (seem to be happening with normals as well).

replies.body: I am getting the same error and am not even queing with anyone :( just after a few minutes in que it comes up 'Group Dispanded' :(
Im getting it every 10 minutes or so, it's quite annoying if queue times are longer then 10.
